listing.listing_description:
Find the perfect pairing of simple design and spectacular views at Villa Ventanas al Mar. The name of this Puerto Vallarta vacation rental translates to “windows on the sea,” and it certainly delivers, commanding sweeping panoramas from its perch on a hillside in the exclusive Conchas Chinas area.

This luxury property was designed for indoor-outdoor living, with expansive outdoor areas featuring a heated infinity pool, hot tub, loungers in the sun and shade, and a barbecue. After sunset, the satellite TV, sound system and Wi-Fi will keep you entertained inside. Your holiday at the villa also includes chef service at two meals each day, as well as the services of a housekeeper and a houseman acting as waiter, bartender and security.

Villa Ventanas al Mar blends Spanish Colonial romance, sleek contemporary style and Asian influences for an eclectic yet unpretentious feel. Fold-away glass doors lead from the terrace into a welcoming open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen with a bar area. Not only does the layout allow warm breezes to flow through the space, but the glass doors frame the views to perfection.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, a terrace or balcony, and ocean views. Two of the bedrooms also have their own private lounge areas. The four suites can accommodate parties of up to eight friends or family members on holiday together.

From the villa’s location in Conchas Chinas, it’s just over half a mile to the nearest beach: the quiet cove of Playa Conchas Chinas. A short drive will bring you to the sandy stretch of Playa Los Muertos, one of the most popular in the area, as well as oceanfront shopping and dining along the boardwalk in Puerto Vallarta.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Indulge in a resort-worthy experience at Villa Amapas North. Set on the ocean in the famous Conchas Chinas in Puerto Vallarta, the three-bedroom villa welcomes you with a full staff, charming architecture and decor and suite-style bedrooms with ocean views. To accommodate the whole family, the villa can be rented with its sister property, Villa Amapas South.

Your stay at Villa Amapas North includes cook service, housekeeping, a houseman and night watchman and one transfer from and to the airport, leaving you free to relax in the beautifully landscaped outdoor living area. The villa opens to an oceanfront terrace with a row of lounge chairs, heated infinity pool, bar, barbecue and two dining areas, one formal and another one alfresco. Fountains and a garden invite peaceful contemplation, but you can also work up a sweat in the fitness area. For entertainment, there’s satellite television, a DVD player and Wi-Fi, and to ensure your comfort, the villa has an elevator, water purification system and air conditioning.

The open living areas at Villa Amapas North are the perfect mix of casual and formal. In the living room, beamed ceilings, stone walls and a built-in sofa create a traditional spot to gather, but you can also open the wide Parota wood doors and nap on the wicker sofa while enjoying the ocean breeze. A unique stone rectangular dining table is a memorable setting for a special meal, while a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar is ready to handle a quick breakfast or snack time.

On the villa’s ground floor, you’ll find a studio-suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, ocean views and terrace access. On the second floor, the Master Suite with a king size, beautifully framed by an intricate iron sculpture, en-suite bathroom with tub, ocean views and terrace access, and a second bedroom with two queen beds, ocean views and terrace access.

From Villa Amapas North, it’s only a 10-minute walk to Los Muertos Beach and Zona Romantica (restaurant row), a 6.4 km drive to Playa Camarones and a 10.3 km drive to Playa de Oro. You’ll find assistance at the Medasist hospital, 2.3 km away, and shopping and dining in downtown Puerto Vallarta, 10.3 km away. Stroll the Vallarta Botanical Gardens, 21.6 km away, or play a round at Nuevo Vallarta Golf Course and Mayan Palace Golf Course, both 24 km away, or Flamingos Golf Course, 28.4 km away. Plan on an 13.1 km drive from Puerto Vallarta International Airport to the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

NOTE: Villa Amapas North can be rented together with Villa Amapas South (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/mexico/puerto-vallarta/conchas-chinas/villa-amapas-south-115438).

listing.listing_description:
For sun, sand and an incredibly elegant ambience, whisk yourself away to the island idyll of Coral Pavilion. This Turks and Caicos vacation rental is right on the sugar-white sands of Grace Bay Beach, but rises above other oceanfront retreats with its stately great-house-inspired architecture. Five bedrooms and a full staff are ready to pamper parties of up to ten friends and family members on a luxury holiday-or just one couple on a decadent honeymoon.

Your stay at Coral Pavilion begins with a complimentary airport transfer, welcome drinks and cold towels, and includes the services of a private chef, butler and housekeeper. Guests are also welcome to bicycles and non-motorized water sports, as well as the gym and resort facilities at nearby Seven Stars. Of course, there's always the temptation of the villa's own heated pool, oceanfront lounging and dining areas, and a sound system and Wi-Fi that extend to the beach.

Inspired by the work of renowned designer Oliver Messel, whose projects ranged from ballet sets and hotel suites to vacation homes for British royalty, the residence takes its cues from the great houses of Barbados for a look that's grand yet inviting. Inside its coral-stone walls, the living and dining areas exude tropical refinement with their white upholstery and graceful chandeliers. The fully equipped kitchen is more exuberant, with its custom tile and Messel green cabinetry, and includes a serving area and butler's pantry.

Coral Pavilion has four bedrooms with king beds, including a stunning master suite with its own lounge area, office and ocean-view terrace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. Accents such as ornately framed mirrors, painted ceramic stools and intricate relief panels used as artwork give the bedroom suites an intriguing touch of the exotic.

The villa opens to 120 feet of beach frontage on gorgeous Grace Bay, famous for its soft sands and clear turquoise waters, and its only 5 minutes from the oceanfront shopping and dining along the same beach. Book a fishing excursion at the nearby Blue Haven Marina, tee off at the Provo Golf & Tennis Club or admire the island's natural wonders at the pristine Princess Alexandra National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunset views without and warm teak within give Samsara a golden glow. Set above the ocean in the Pointe Milou area of St. Barts, this west-facing contemporary vacation rental makes the most of its location with welcoming indoor-outdoor living areas. Two suite-style bedrooms are the perfect alternative to a resort for couples on holiday together or a relaxed tropical honeymoon.

The calm expanse of Lorient Bay stretches out beneath this oceanfront luxury property. Folding walls open the front of the house to a spacious deck, where an infinity pool and row of loungers invite you to take in the views at your leisure. As the sun sinks toward the water, heat up the barbecue, set the mood with the sound system and sit down to dinner with the brilliant sky as your backdrop.

Inspired by traditional Balinese villas, the interiors of Samsara use warm-hued Java teak for a welcoming feel. Not only does the influence show up in the great room’s beamed ceilings and polished floors, it’s also in the sitting area’s low, spacious sectional and carved accent pieces. A yellow feature wall is a playful pop of color that’s matched by the sofa cushions. The adjacent dining area isn’t quite outside, but gets a definite al-fresco feel from the fold-back walls, and in the fully equipped kitchen, beautiful granite counters draw their rich blue tones from the sea outside.

Both bedrooms at Samsara have a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views, so it’s not hard to choose between the two. The only differences: one opens to a private terrace with lounge furniture, and the other opens to a tucked-away outdoor shower.

Both a hotspot for the glamorous set and a favorite with celebrities on family vacation, St. Barts is at once chic and laid-back. A stay at Samsara lets you see both sides, with three gorgeous beaches a short drive away boasting the island’s famous white sands and clear waters, as well as the Colombier Beach Trail. A 7.1 km drive will bring you to excellent restaurants and lively nightlife, and a 20-minute drive puts you in the center of the designer boutiques of downtown Gustavia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Early birds and night owls alike will find their bliss at Windchat Villas. Made up of two villas, Sunrise and Sunset, this luxury oceanfront Bahamas vacation rental has exceptional views of the island and ocean, as well as 250 feet of gorgeous pink-sand beach. As another beautiful Caribbean day dawns over the eastern point of the island of Eleuthera, welcome the sun from one of the four bedrooms—two in each villa—and gather with friends and family during the day in the resort-worthy outdoor living areas.

There’s plenty at Windchat Villas for guests of all ages (and activity levels). Down at the beach, have a swim in the warm water, take the kayaks or stand-up paddleboards out to explore or bring back honeymoon memories with a sunset stroll along the sand. Spot cruise ships from the porches, flip on the sound system as you stretch out in a lounger by the heated infinity pool or challenge everyone to shuffleboard, foosball, ping-pong or even tennis or basketball on the private court. When the sun begins to sink, rinse off in one of the outdoor showers and heat up the barbecue for dinner.

Built in 1964 by a Pan American Airways executive and recently renovated, Sunrise was the original villa on the site; its counterpart, Sunset, was just finished. But although they differ in age, the two houses share open layouts, a breezy aesthetic and stunning views. Neutral walls, high ceilings and sand-colored tile floors form the base for furnishings in tropical hues of watery turquoise and palm-leaf green. Both villas have formal dining areas with ocean views and bright, fully equipped kitchens.

Each of the two Windchat Villas has a master suite and one additional bedroom. In Sunrise, the master suite has a king bed, private hall bathroom and ocean views, and the second bedroom has two twin beds and an ensuite bathroom. There is also a sleeping loft available to accomodate two additional guests. In Sunset, all three bedrooms have an ensuite bathroom, and two bedrooms feature a balcony as well as ocean views. 

From the villas’ location on North Palmetto Point, you’ll have easy access to the island’s other standout beaches, attractions and airports. Book your ticket into Governor’s Harbor Airport, Rock Sound International Airport or North Eleuthera Airport. Once at Windchat Villas, you’re just a 13 km drive from French Leave Beach and within day-trip distance of Surfer’s Beach and Lighthouse Beach. Ask the villa manager if you need help organizing a snorkeling or fishing expedition, a horseback ride on the beach, or take a day trip to swim with the pigs on Exuma. Meet local fauna at Edwin’s Turtle Lake Marine Preserve, locals themselves at Governor’s Harbour, or marvel at the natural scenery of Ocean Hole, the Hatchet Bay Caves, the Glass Window Bridge and Preacher’s Cave. If you have time to see more of the Bahamas on your holiday, neighboring Harbour Island is 70 km away, and tiny Spanish Wells is 85 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Trunks sprout in the great room and leaves wave outside this treehouse-like villa in the Costa Rica jungle. Two terraces offer up forest and ocean views, and sliding teak and glass walls make the house feel as though it’s grown up out of the lush landscape. It’s a 3-minute walk through the trees to the surf break at Playa Guiones, whose sandy bottom and quieter vibe are well suited to beginners.

 This vacation rental beckons you outdoors with a deck stretching the width of the house, an infinity pool, loungers set in the sunshine, a barbecue, and covered sitting and dining areas facing the ocean. A second deck has its own sitting and dining spots. Wi-Fi keeps you connected to friends and family at home, air conditioning keeps you comfortable, and laundry facilities are there for your convenience.

 The walls of this luxury property have three layers: a teak panel, glass and a screen, which you can close for privacy or open to let the breezes flow through. The open-concept living room and fully equipped kitchen gets its warm, welcoming vibe from teak ceilings and floors, and tree trunks supporting the ceiling add to the fresh-from-nature feel.

 The casa has two bedrooms with king beds, including one with its own terrace and one with a honeymoon-suite-worthy balcony and al-fresco bathtub and shower. The third bedroom has a queen bed and a twin bunk bed. All three bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.

 If you’ve ever wanted to surf, a Costa Rica holiday is the time—and with Playa Guiones a 3-minute walk from the villa, you can practice on your own whenever you want or book a lesson with Safari Surf School, 6 minutes away by car. If you’re visiting between July and November, drive to Ostional National Wildlife Refuge to watch olive ridley turtles come ashore to lay their eggs.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With its gorgeous beachfront location, charming colonial-style architecture and range of luxury amenities, Hacienda Corazon is a Riviera Maya vacation rental after your heart. Reserve its ten bedrooms for a getaway with up to twenty friends or extended family, or book with its two sister villas to host a family reunion, milestone celebration or destination wedding for up to 250 guests.

Your holiday at Hacienda Corazon includes the services of a gourmet chef, villa manager, butler and housekeeper. After you’ve finished your welcome refreshments, get down to relaxing and playing with the help of the heated pool, al-fresco living and dining areas, outdoor sound system and barbecue. There’s also a games room inside, along with a choice of video games, a satellite television, a wine cooler and Wi-Fi.

Inspired by traditional Mexican estates, the residence is laid out around a tranquil central courtyard. Follow the arched doorways into inviting living and dining areas with intricate tilework, vibrant fabrics and sleek furnishings. 

The hacienda has four bedrooms with king beds, three bedrooms with two queen beds each, and three bedrooms with two twin beds, which can be combined into king beds if desired. All ten bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have ocean views or open to a terrace.

Set off from Hacienda Corazon in the provided kayaks or atop the paddleboards to explore the bay just in front of the house. From the villa’s location in the exclusive Puerto Aventuras community, it’s also a 15-minute drive or less to the golf and tennis club and downtown Playa del Carmen. For a memorable day trip, make the 30-minute drive to the Tulum ruins or the 45-minute drive to Tulum itself and find out why it’s becoming a trendy honeymoon destination.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Sunsets glow over the ocean and neighboring St. Thomas rises from the sea—as seen from the patio of this Mediterranean-inspired villa on St. John. It’s part of a clutch of villas set above Cruz Bay like an Italian hilltop village, and shares a clubhouse, fitness center, and pool with them. Drive or take a taxi down to more dining and shopping choices in central Cruz Bay.

Stone gates at the entrance give the feeling of sweeping up to a European country estate, but once you reach the house, the views are all Caribbean. Watch sailboats in the harbor below from a lounger by the private swimming pool—or better yet, from a float in the pool. As the sun sinks lower, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the alfresco table.

Even the great room offers a place to bask in the sun, thanks to a wall of windows that dapples the sitting area with light. A short set of stairs separates the living room from a dining area for 6 brightened by seashell art and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

The villa is a short walk from the shared fitness center, pool, and clubhouse at The Hills, so it’s easy to fit in a workout or stop for a glass of wine at the clubhouse bistro. Find shops, restaurants, activities, and ferry docks in Cruz Bay, the island’s main town, or find your bliss on one of the pristine beaches within a short drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the dynamic hillside community of Pedregal, Casa Esperanza is a newly constructed luxury vacation rental with accommodations for eighteen. Unlike most other villas in Pedregal, Esperanza has direct walking access to the beachfront, a feature that is rare in this steep hillside area with a beautiful sunset view. And, while maintaining an exceptional level of privacy, it’s just five minutes from the heart of downtown Cabo San Lucas.

Whether you’re looking for a secluded place to sit and read, or a spacious environment for a full group hangout, Esperanza has the spot for you. The main living area is massive, and the domed brick-ceiling and numerous windowed openings give it an even grander feel. When the doors are open, the space is filled with fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight and the line between inside and out is delightfully blurry. The lounge area has a plush “L” shaped couch and a couple leather arm chairs facing the dynamic ocean view. The kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a social breakfast bar that helps unify the entire open concept atmosphere. The formal dining table has space for ten and resides beneath its own brick-ceiling and an elegant chandelier.

Inside Esperanza’s walls you’ll find plenty to keep you busy and entertained, like Satellite television, a Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi. On the terrace there’s an amazing infinity pool and hot tub combination, great for relaxing while looking out upon the ocean view. You’ll also find sun loungers and a fire pit on the balcony.

A great way to see Cabo’s dynamic landscapes is from the sea, and Cabo’s marina is the perfect place to charter a tourist or fishing boat for an afternoon of exploring. If there’s a golfer in your group, Cabo del Sol Golf Course is another scenic option. And, for delicious beachfront dining, boutique shopping, and an exciting nightlife, Cabo San Lucas can’t be beat.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Panoramic views of sand and sea unfurl from the lush rooftop lounge atop this sunny palm-lined retreat. Surrounded by turquoise waters and powdery white sand, this 2-storey mansion incorporates beach-inspired elements with a modern atmosphere. Natural light spills into every room, illuminating reclaimed teak floors, natural wood accents, and funky, modern décor. A butler and concierge service free up time to hop on the bikes and meander up the coastline in search of a favourite local beach bar.

On the back terrace, a table for 12 lets your crew dine alfresco straight off the barbecue. (Perfect for your complimentary chef to whip up some local cuisine.) Work up a sweat in the gym before taking a refreshing cool down in the aquamarine-hued infinity pool. The media room is a comfy spot to recharge with a favourite flick before heading out to the sunken fire pit—perhaps with a Spanish coffee in hand. Afterwards, fall asleep to the peaceful sound of gentle waves rolling onto the shore beyond. 

Drive less than 10-minutes to get to restaurants & shops, Grace Bay Beach, and Blue Haven Marina. When you return, mix yourself a drink at the complimentary starter bar, and opt for one of the many sun loungers in, around, or overlooking the ocean. The rooftop lounge space, detailed with sun-bleached stones and scattered bushes, makes for the perfect spot to steal a moment away in the shade.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
In Pointe Milou, just 7 km from the airport, you’ll find this well-appointed home, recently renovated, and offering up some of the best sunset views of all our St. Barts villas. The island of St. Barts, with its perpetual sunshine, offers some of the top restaurants in the Caribbean as well as some of the best shopping around.

Enjoy stunning views of the sea while lounging on one of the sun chairs on the tiled terrace. They surround the infinity-edge pool, a refreshing way to cool down on hot days. This backyard space also includes an outdoor seating area and a barbecue for an evening of casual dining. Those who need to stay connected can take advantage of the Wi-Fi access.

Within the home, the decor is contemporary and features an open-design concept. The living room opens up to terrace and offers views of the sea, plush sofas, glass coffee tables and a zebra-print area rug. Vaulted ceilings with fans keeps things cool, while the nearby equipped kitchen is loaded with gadgets to make cold drinks, including an ice maker, blender and a beverage fridge.

The villa’s three bedrooms overlook the sea and can accommodate up to six guests—all offer en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning as well as televisions with DVD players. Two rooms include queen-sized beds while the third bedroom’s two twin beds can be converted into a queen bed.

The beach closest to this charming home is Lorient, a reef-protected spot with calm waters perfect for swimming. This spot tends to be less crowded than some of the other, better-known beaches. Meanwhile, the island’s capital, Gustavia, is just 7.4 km away. Here you’ll find plenty of sightseeing attractions as well as diverse restaurants, boutiques and gift shops.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The ocean peeks through curtains of palm fronds outside the louvered windows of this minimalist home on Barbados’ west coast. Inspired by the simple layout of the island’s traditional chattel houses, this contemporary villa uses wood-paneled ceilings to shade and slatted walls to invite cooling breezes. Follow the path to golden Gibbes Beach for a swim in the shallows or nap in the shade. 

Watch the waves from a lounger on the oceanfront deck, toss local seafood on the barbecue for a quick lunch or dinner, and soak in the al-fresco hot tub as the sun sets over the water. An Apple TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and wine fridge make light work of finding evening entertainment. Your holiday at this vacation rental also includes the services of a cook and housekeeper.

A koi pond greets you at the entrance to this luxury property, creating a tranquil feel and hinting at the ocean views to come. That calm pervades the open-concept living areas, from a sitting area with sofas clustered around a Noguchi coffee table to a dining table for eight. The neutral palette and sleek surfaces continue in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the three bedrooms at Shoestring has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; one of them also has a honeymoon-suite-worthy private balcony with a hot tub. Together, the bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to six friends or family members.

St. Peter is known for having some of the best beaches on Barbados, and Gibbes Beach—just in front of the villa—is no exception. It’s a quiet stretch of golden sand, ringed by tall trees for shade and opening to relatively calm, shallow waters. Depending on the tide, you can also wade north to Mullins Beach for an ice cream from the stand or a cocktail from the beach bar.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Fall under Costa Rica’s spell at the enchanting Diosa del Mar. Owned by two world-renowned artists, the five-bedroom oceanfront villa in Guanacaste features both beautiful sunset views over the Pacific and magazine-worthy interiors. The white sands of Playa Blanca are just steps away, and the surf of Playa Negra is a short drive from the villa.

The heart of Diosa del Mar is a showstopping sixty-foot infinity pool overlooking the ocean. Relax by the pool in one of the lounge chairs, hammocks or on the daybed, or explore the sea with flotation devices and snorkeling equipment. There’s an outdoor shower for rinsing off and a gas grill for prepping dinner. In the evening, gather around the fireplace and browse via Wi-Fi, and stay comfortable thanks to air conditioned bedrooms and ceiling fans.

Gingerbread trim, beamed ceilings, white beadboard walls and dark wood floors give the villa charm and character, while floor-to-ceiling windows offer gorgeous ocean views. Low white leather sectionals provide plenty of seating in the living room, while brilliantly colored artwork is a unique, tropical touch. The dining room’s carved white chairs and striped cushions have a similarly relaxed, beachy feel, and a glass wall can be opened to let in the sea breeze. The modern kitchen pairs wood cabinets and counters with stainless steel appliances and beadboard ceilings.

The five bedrooms at Diosa del Mar have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, as well as the same whitewashed walls, high ceilings and charming detail as the rest of the house. Striped bedding is a crisp nod to the seaside setting, while upholstered headboards in painterly fabrics inspire sweet dreams.

From the villa, it’s a short walk to either the white sands of Playa Blanca or a local restaurant. It’s a 5-minute drive to Playa Negra or the Junquillal grocery store, a 10-minute drive to church and a 30-minute drive to the Pinilla golf course. A 40-minute drive brings you to the tennis club or airport in Tamarindo, a 45-minute drive brings you to the town of Santa Cruz, and downtown Liberia and its hospital are a 75-minute drive from the property.

Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Turquesa is pure heaven for anyone seeking a relaxed, upscale ambiance for a group retreat, family getaway or escape among friends. Discover this magnificent 9-bedroom estate perched cliffside, 150 ft above the turquoise Pacific, in exclusive Pedregal. Drink in breathtaking views of the ocean, Cabo’s famous beaches, and at night, watch the lights of this legendary Baja California oasis come alive around you.

Your outdoor living spaces are a resort unto themselves. Float along in an infinity pool that features a full swim-up bar at one end. Bask in the sun from a soft chaise longue or retreat with friends under the large, thatched-roof lounge. Get active in the afternoons with a putting green challenge or shuffleboard tournament. Host a cocktail party in the evening, preparing fresh seafood on the built-in barbecue, as a fire crackles in the outdoor fireplace. Up to 60 people will enjoy dining outside as the sun sets over the horizon.

Experience 15,000 sq ft of elegant splendor inside Villa Turquesa. Spacious rooms are adorned with cozy, contemporary lounge furniture and rustic accessories. Each room treats you to magnificent ocean views, and blend seamlessly into the outdoor spaces through pocket glass walls. Host movie night in the theater room or sweat it out in the full gym and sauna. The gourmet kitchen has enough premium appliances to feed a small army of famished guests. Spend a few quiet moments alone around the fireplace or in the charming library.

Villa Turquesa’s nine spectacular bedrooms are spread among three floors, and a housekeeper is on-hand weekdays to help you maintain their beauty. The bedrooms contain either King and Queen beds, with the exception of the children’s room where you’ll find bunk beds leading out to a playground. Most rooms lead directly to outdoor spaces and all have private en-suites. The exquisite Master-suite displays ocean views and features its own spa-inspired en-suite and an al fresco shower.

Cabo San Lucas is famous for its eco-diversity which can be explored by boat, car, foot or flipper. You’re a short walk away from the soothing shores of Pedregal Beach, while two other famous stretches of sand are within a 5 minute drive. From your villa you can see the rocky profile of Land’s End, but venture closer to witness the unique El Arco rock formation. Head into central Cabo and discover fine dining, traditional mexican fare, as well as nightlife options ranging from wild nights at Cabo Wabo to more sophisticated choices.

NOTE : This villa can be rented as a 4BR/5BA rental. (Lowest floor containing 5 bedrooms, large home theater, putting green, children’s play area and shuffleboard court will be locked off.) This option offers 10,000 sq feet of indoor space and sleeps up to 12 persons.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get the feel of a private island with the convenience of a location close to downtown Nassau, golf and shopping at Colonial Paradise. Set on a beautiful white-sand beach in an exclusive development with stunning water views, the chic contemporary villa truly lives up to its name. Four suite-style bedrooms and inviting modern interiors give the property boutique hotel-worthy appeal.

During your stay at Colonial Paradise, a housekeeper, chef, property manager and even the captain of your own private boat (for local transport) are at your service. Start the day with a yoga session in the villa’s tropical gardens, a workout in the shared fitness facilities or a stroll on the beach that stretches just in front of the property and has views of Nassau and Atlantis. Cool off in the saltwater pool, take a boat trip from the private dock and, in the evenings, enjoy local seafood at the al-fresco dining area.

Huge windows, an open-plan layout and neutral-toned furnishings give the villa’s interiors a beachy yet sophisticated vibe. In the living room and media room, clean-lined cream sofas and tables are sleek and modern, while subtle coral-print pillows and driftwood-hued wood paneling are nods to the seaside setting. There’s a formal dining area with wicker seating, a whimsical chandelier and ocean views, as well as a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at Colonial Paradise has an en-suite bathroom. There are two master suites, each with a king bed, lounge area and ocean views, and a third bedroom with a king bed and patio. The fourth bedroom has two queen beds and its own lounge area. Wood floors, neutral tones and details like four-poster beds or tufted headboards give the bedrooms the comfort and feel of a stylish boutique hotel.

A 10-minute boat ride takes you from downtown Nassau to Colonial Paradise. Once you’ve arrived at the villa, you’re on Colonial Beach and a 2-minute walk from Paradise Beach. Find what you need—or just want— at Paradise Shopping Plaza, just over 1.5 km away, relax at the Four Seasons Ocean Club, 2.6 km away or tee off at Paradise Island Golf Club, 3.5 km away. When you have to leave Paradise, it’s a 20.2 km trip to Lynden Pindling International Airport.

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/home-on-paradise-island-bahamas/)

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

_ Please note: You must take a boat ride to arrive at the property._

listing.listing_description:
Contemporary architecture goes to the beach at Villa Bella Vita. You’ll love gazing upon endless ocean views from Bella Vita’s many luxurious lounge areas. For a closer look, step off the end of the pool deck, and you’ll be on your own private beachfront. Back inside, you and up to fifteen more guests will enjoy and appreciate Bella Vita’s nine king bedrooms, and spacious open concept layout. About a minute’s walk East, you’ll find one of the World’s most gorgeous stretches of sand, Sunset Beach. Also, less than ten miles from home, you’ll be able to enjoy the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Grace Bay.

Bella Vita is the perfect home base for your large group. With two-kitchens, an exercise room, games room, spacious lounge areas, and a basketball court, this villa spares no expense when it comes to entertainment. Nor does it spare any expense on designer furniture, high-end electronics, or eclectic decor. And, with wide openings to the terrace and an open-air layout, Bella Vita’s ocean view and beachfront atmosphere are felt and seen throughout the entire interior.

Upon arrival, you’ll be met at the airport by Bella Vita’s staff and transported to and from the villa. You’ll also have use of a Jeep during your stay. You and your guests will love spending afternoons in the ocean, and Bella Vita comes equipped with water sports equipment, an infinity pool, outdoor living/dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with barbecue to make your time in the sun even more fun.

Within 24 km of Bella Vita’s beachfront estate, you’ll be able to find everything you need on your Turks and Caicos getaway. There are markets and grocery stores nearby in the Leeward Settlement with the freshest seafood imaginable. If you’re feeling sporty, The Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club and Provo Golf Club are both a short drive from home. To enjoy some local nature and wildlife spend an afternoon at Princess Alexandra National Park. Also, you’ll find wine and tiki bars, and restaurants around the corner at Turtle Cove.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This custom-designed home is one of our most unique Barbados villa rentals—it’s shaped like a crescent, allowing you to see panoramic sea views from every room. With a perfect climate, stretches of amazing beaches and a unique culture, the island of Barbados offers visitors a memorable tropical getaway.

Indulge in the quiet serenity of the manicured back gardens that feature a fountain and swaying palm trees, or lounge on the pool deck on one of the cushioned chaises surrounded by stunning sea views. The large infinity-edge pool seems to almost blend into the turquoise waters of the sea ahead.

Inside, this estate boasts an open-air concept and views of the sea, and it is tastefully decorated with soft furnishings, marble floors and calming, neutral tones with pops of colour. The living room features cozy seating, high ceilings, and access to a large patio overlooking the garden and pool. A dining room offers soaring ceilings, a table with seating for up to eight, large doors with sea views and a small tropical garden. Meanwhile, the bright kitchen is fully equipped with Miele appliances and has French doors leading out to the back garden.

The home allows up to eight guests, and has four bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and sea views. The master bedroom on the northern tip of the home features vaulted ceilings, a soaking tub and a private terrace through double French doors. Two other bedrooms are in the same wing, one being able to connect with the master, and the final, queen-sized bedroom is found on the far end of the home.

From here, you’ll be close to Holetown’s high-end shopping mall as well as some of the island’s top restaurants, and museum hopping can be done in the historic Speightstown, only a 10-minute drive away. Don’t forget to take in plenty of beach time—Sandy Lane beach is just 4.8 km from the property.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning two-bedroom contemporary villa is the perfect hideaway for a honeymoon couple, a small family or two couples. The stylish grand entrance creates a dramatic stage for a breathtaking sea view - sunsets are pure magic.

The grand living room is open, airy with an opulent contemporary attitude. Floor to ceiling doors disappear into the wall providing unobstructed views and breezes. Sand color travertine tiles flow seamlessly from indoors to outdoors. Gorgeous designer furniture detailed in beautiful dark woods, comfortable upholstered seating and tasteful art create a relaxing interior lounging area. The color scheme is relaxing in cream, off white and taupe. The sleek and stylish open plan kitchen is open to the view and the exterior dining room, while the barbeque is adjacent to the kitchen. Throughout the villa, pots filled with tropical plants dot the terraces creating a Feng shui attitude.

The two very large and equal size bedrooms are places of relaxing solitude furnished in cream bedding, beautiful fabrics, soft sand polished travertine tiles and beautifully inlaid woods. The spa style bathrooms are simply gorgeous, each one in unique combination of luxe woods, travertine and stainless fixtures. Both have oversized walk-in showers.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are 2 minutes to the grocery at Puerto Cupecoy and another five minutes to the airport. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description:
A fusion of Mexican and modern architecture, this elegant beachfront villa features not only stunning design, but is also steps away from the golden sand and azure surf of Los Cabos famous East Cape. Situated in the exclusive new development of Puerto Los Cabos, Casa Piedra Blanca takes your vacation retreat to another level.

The mexican Hacienda style converges in a beautiful terrace surrounded by exotic vegetation wit

Experience three miles of pristine coastline, a world-class marina and Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman signature golf courses during your stay at Casa Piedra Blanca. Step into the exclusive world of Puerto Los Cabos, a 2000-acre destination resort where modern comforts and amenities meet age-old traditions for gracious living. Right on the sea, at Casa Piedra Blanca you will be perfectly poised for a fabulous vacation in the sun.

The grounds at Casa Piedra Blanca include a pristine, heated infinity swimming pool. You can also relax in the outdoor hot tub and allow the soothing bubbles to massage your cares away. You’ll also find ample deck space on which to lounge around and a fire pit—perfect for stargazing at night. Alfresco dining is such a delight on the large table on the covered terrace. The interiors of Casa Piedra Blanca feature purified water, satellite television, Blu-ray/DVD players, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and ceiling fans. Your reservation includes security and housekeeping.

A fusion of classic Mexican and modern architecture, this elegant beachfront villa features not only stunning design, but is also steps away from the golden sand and azure surf of Los Cabos’ famous East Cape. Vaulted ceilings and bright interiors lend an airy and breezy atmosphere to this stunning villa. The traditional hacienda style converges in a beautiful terrace surrounded by exotic vegetation. You will enjoy a little break from the sun in the open plan living and dining areas. The fully equipped kitchen includes a center island and a breakfast bar.

Five magnificent bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests at Casa Piedra Blanca. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms. Four of the suites offer televisions, DVD players and direct access to the terrace. Fall sound asleep with nothing but the sound of waves as your soundtrack.

Come to Cabo expecting to toss your inhibitions to the wind? Where else do clubs round up conga lines so that waiters can pour tequila down dancers’ throats? Those moments of absurdity and abandon notwithstanding, Cabo San Lucas has a curious charm and is also perfect for families. The beaches are protected by beautiful Land’s End, and the activities are endless: jet-skiing, banana boating, parasailing, snorkeling, kite surfing, diving and horseback riding opportunities can all be explored by just walking down to the beach. Paradise awaits!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Down the long driveway lined with coral stone walls and flamboyant, you arrive in the courtyard of this elegant Creole style villa. It is a quiet, private oasis that sets the stage for relaxing outdoor living and a lush tropical view that begins the moment you enter the villa. The large turquoise pool, accented with a visually pleasing sculpture, draws your eye straight to the stately palms and beyond to the cerulean sea.

There is a beautiful flow to the house; an almost seamless connection inside to outside. Although very open, it is private. Large covered galleries create multiple options for dining, lounging and sunning. It also creates a cool space for firing up the barbeque. Sleek, yet comfortable, new loungers surround the pool.

The décor is serene and tasteful, both inside and outside. The open plan interior living area contains comfortable oversized seating and inside dining. Adjacent to the main living area is the well-equipped, modern kitchen in sleek white, steel and black. All the interior living spaces open to the terrace and the view. The décor is eclectic, contemporary and relaxed in white, beige and taupe accented with driftwood and dark woods. Beautiful paintings, sculpture and exotic African art adds a very distinctive designer touch to the space.

Four bedrooms are set off the pool terrace. The décor is in the mood of a luxe boutique hotel; elegant and serene, each room in a different, yet connective, rich neutral color palette; taupe, cream, charcoal, driftwood and metallic. The en suite bathrooms are works of art with travertine tiles, dark stone, marble countertops, sculpted sinks and beautiful fixtures. Several bathrooms overlook the gardens; one overlooks the sea. For larger gatherings, the sister villa, La Nina, shares the same lot and provides an additional two bedrooms. The two also share a tennis court.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. It’s a short drive to beaches such as Plum Bay and Long Bay. You are ten minutes to the airport. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description:
Awaken your senses at Nuit Blanche, a newly renovated 3-bedroom villa, located in the exclusive community of Terres Basses on the French side of St-Martin. Nuit Blanche is surrounded by a beautiful tropical garden that extends to the large dark pool that keeps the sun’s warmth so the water is comfortable for an evening swim. This cozy, yet elegant, villa offers a splendid view that combines iconic Caribbean elements : palms, beautiful foliage and glimpses of the sapphire Caribbean Sea.

Walk through the rustic, original to the villa, front door and take in the tropical garden view that extends to the sea. The interior living space includes a large comfy couch to enjoy Netflix movies at night but also opens to a modern but refined fully equipped kitchen. Meals can be taken out on the covered terrace around the beautiful dining table - a perfect setting when hiring a Chef to cook for dinner. The "tropical chic" decoration is elegant and fun, with touches of colour in white, green and gold. The atmosphere is bright but also relaxing.

Three bedrooms, with air conditioning and king size beds, all connect off the main living area - a dream for parents traveling with young kids. The decor is simple but luxurious with natural colors and textures. One bedroom can convert from a king to twin beds for kids to better share the space. Each room has access to a terrace space overlooking the garden, their own en-suite bathrooms with outdoor showers & bathtubs too. 

Outside you will find a large covered living space which features built in couches and funky zebra print ottomans for extra seating. This is the place to sit and take in the setting sun with a cocktail in hand. The living space flows in to the al-fresco dining area which flows to the beautiful tropical wooden deck connecting the house and the pool area. Around the infinity pool, wooden terraces on several levels offer endless possibilities for dining, lounging or sunbathing. The outdoor kitchen with bar and built-in BBQ is the ideal place to share memories with family or friends. Shaded spaces with daybeds allow you to enjoy the sun and the lush vegetation while also only steps from your pool. Imagine yourself immersed in a tropical postcard.

Long Bay Beach and Plum Bay Beach, two of the most beautiful beaches on the island, are only 2 minutes away by car. Located in the heart of the quiet and relaxing community of Terres Basses, the villa is only a short 10-20 minute for the dynamic nightlife found in the Maho and Simpson Bay neighborhoods respectively. Supermarkets, shops and restaurants are only 5 minutes to Porto Cupecoy and Nettle Bay while the international airport is 10 minutes door to door.

listing.listing_description:
Paynes Bay, nicknamed “The Platinum Coast,” is Barbados most prestigious beach community. With the calmest and clearest water on the island, Paynes Bay is perfect for first-time snorkelers and relaxing swims. Old Trees is a three-bedroom luxury apartment, located right on the sandy beachfront. Forget about all the hassle of driving to the beach, at Old Trees, you can pop-in and out with ease. And, with large openings to the covered terrace, the ocean view is always in focus.

Relaxing pastel tones, vibrant greenery, and endless turquoise ocean views set the mood at Old Trees. Designer furniture and state of the art electronics decorate the tranquil environment. Archways, columns, and vaulted wood-ceilings compliment the laid-back atmosphere with a touch of elegance. The master bedroom features a king-sized bed, walk-in closet, a balcony with an amazing ocean view, and an en-suite bathroom with a rain shower and full tub.

Old Trees is an effortlessly comfortable vacation home with all the amenities of normal life, and it’s just steps from the beach. The fully equipped kitchen comes with a coffee machine, ice machine, dishwasher, and formal dining area for eight. There is Wi-Fi and a flat-screen television to keep you connected. And, the apartment has air conditioning, daily housekeeping, and a twenty-four-hour security guard. Outside on the private balcony, you’ll love the gorgeous ocean view, sun loungers, and alfresco dining set. There’s also a shared swimming pool downstairs.

You’ve got your Paynes Bay beachfront right downstairs, but if you’d like to explore some of the other beautiful beaches in Barbados, you’re in the right area. Within five kilometers, you’ll have access to Sandy Lane, Batts Rock, Colony Club, and Paradise Beach. If you’ve got a golf aficionado in the group, Royal Westmoreland Golf Course is close by as well. And, the area surrounding the Platinum Coast is renowned for its high-end restaurants and boutique shops.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beach Enclave is located along coveted International Drive, a prestigious cul-de-sac known for its designer homes. The area offers stunning views of Turks and Caicos’ North Shore, the protected Princess Alexandra National Park and the teeming barrier reef. This private neighborhood offers tranquility with low density and scant traffic. Right on the oceanfront of Babalua Beach and less than ten minutes from Grace Bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate Caribbean holiday!

The combination of private beach access, easy and breezy living and magnificent views along with the vacation rental’s luxury services and management make this property a one-of-a-kind real estate opportunity in Providenciales. Beach Enclave is generously embedded in the lush, natural vegetation of the islands with less than one home per acre. Outdoor perks include a swimming pool, an alfresco dining area for eight, a barbeque, fire pit, an outdoor shower and plenty of sun loungers. The private beach area is accessible via a carved limestone staircase.

High ceilings and a predominantly white decorative scheme keep the feelings light and bright at this magnificent holiday home. Subtle wooden accents in the great room help keep the atmosphere balanced and grounded. Enjoy dinner at the formal dining table that is uniquely hewn to preserve the original shape and grains of the tree. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and an espresso machine. Wi-Fi access is free.

The four stunning bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. The two master suites feature king size beds, dual vanities, alfresco showers and balconies. All of the suites offer television, ceiling fans and ocean views.

Don’t forget – group yoga sessions are included with your reservation. Get into that meditative state you’ve been craving for so long! You will also be within easy driving distance of the Provo Golf Club. We recommend this villa for a family vacation, a decadent honeymoon or couples’ retreat or a special event such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Del Mar is an exquisite luxury home at Playa del Carmen, situated just steps from the beach within the Playacar Phase One gated community. The superbly appointed residence includes two terraces, high-end amenities for dining and entertainment, and a talented staff, while its prime location offers serene privacy within walking distance of myriad activities. With accommodations for ten guests, Villa del Mar forms an ideal haven for families and groups of friends seeking comfort, style, and convenience in this gem of the Riviera Maya.

The home evokes the elegance of Old Mexico, with its luminous white facades, terracotta rooftop, and columns of weathered stone. The lower terrace features a swimming pool traversed by a delightful marble footbridge leading to the main entrance. Ample sitting areas invite you to bask in the Caribbean sunlight or relax in the cool shade, and there is an excellent rustic grill for barbeque cooking. In the evening, gather on the rooftop terrace for alfresco meals, delicious drinks, and soothing hot tub soaks while gazing at the dreamy sea.

The main interior living room (off the pool terrace) features peaked ceilings with rich wood beams, abundant natural light, and exquisite décor blending modern comfort with antique charm. A fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a marble bar serves a beautiful wooden dining table for eight. Downstairs, the wonderful party room is like a deluxe cantina, with a full bar, billiard table, wine cellar, lounge, and casual dining table.

The master suite opens directly to the upper terrace and includes a king bed and deluxe ensuite bathroom with jetted tub. On the ground floor, the large junior suite opens to the pool terrace and also features a jetted tub in its bathroom, set within a lovely niche. Two other guestrooms—one with king bed, one with two queen beds—share a bathroom between them. The spacious media room has two queen-size sofa beds.

Villa del Mar offers one of the finest possible locations at Playa del Carmen, within walking distance of the beach, a spa, tennis courts, and the town's famous Quinta Avenida. The community also includes two excellent golf courses, as well as extraordinary Mayan ruins that guests are free to explore.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Idyllically positioned amidst the sparkling white sands and aquamarine waters of Rendezvous Bay in Anguilla, Arushi Villa brings private luxury to this spectacular and natural Caribbean paradise. As part of the five-star Cuisinart Resort, you will also have access to most of its marvelous facilities and services including the famous Gregg Norman golf course that’s just steps away.

Arushi Villa’s pristine white exterior contrasts dramatically with Anguilla’s flawless cerulean blue skies. This modern and luxurious escape successfully combines thoughtfully designed indoor and outdoor living areas to provide you with perfect seclusion and relaxation. Your villa’s extensive amenities include an immaculate fully-equipped kitchen and dining area, a private heated pool and hot tub, al fresco dining facilities and the security and comfort that you are part of an exclusive gated community. For your convenience, all butler and concierge services are included in one simple rate.

You’ll enjoy pampering and privacy with the five-star amenities of the exclusive Cuisinart Resort at your service, which include its fitness center and tennis courts. And for golf lovers, Anguilla’s famous 18-hole Gregg Norman golf course is right on your doorstep. There really is something special for everyone when you stay at Arushi.

Arushi Villa’s five elegantly appointed master suites all include luxurious marble bathrooms and air conditioning throughout, ensuring you and your guests needs are all well looked after. All you need to do is relax and envelop yourself in Arushi’s restful ambience.

At Arushi you can truly savor the experience of the perfect luxury tropical getaway that’s surrounded with lush natural beauty. You will also receive exceptional private service and access to the many amenities provided by the 5-star Cuisinart Resort and Spa. Safely and privately located within its gated community, it’s just a 9.1 km drive to The Valley, a 10.3 km drive to the hospital, just 3.4 km to the Blowing Point Ferry Terminal and a 8.9 km drive to Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport (AXA).

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Surround yourself with sandy beachfront at this compound-style villa on the edge of the Riviera Maya in Tulum. 3 fully-equipped beach casitas offer private escapes when you’re not hanging out on the beach, swimming in the pool, or barbequing with the rest of the group. If you can tear yourself away from the sand, bring your camera to the Tulum Ruins and get some shots from the cliffside.

Wake up to the sound of palm trees rustling in the sea breeze and waves gently washing ashore. Head outside to do some reading in the hammock underneath 1 of several hay-thatched palapas on the beachfront. When you’re ready for breakfast, fix your self something fresh in your Spanish colonial-style casita, where the soothing decor and warm woods set a relaxing tone.

Each casita comes fully equipped with everything a stand-alone unit would have, making Casa Corazon perfect for multi-family getaways. Stretch out on a beach towel or pick a lounge chair in the sun to work on your tan while the kids splash around in the swimming pool. Housekeeping, and the on-site concierge will take care of everything else.

The Riviera Maya is full of natural wonders to discover like Laguna de Kaan Luum, an ancient cenote known for its mud bath. Fall in love with burritos all over again at Burrito Amor, famous for wrapping its creations in a banana-leaf. Then, dance the night away to live music at Mojito Bar, where you’ll find a huge selection of tropical cocktails and casual, yet bustling atmosphere.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.
